description: Detects tampering with the "ChannelAccess" registry key in order to change access to windows event channel
name: Change Winevt Event Access Permission Via Registry
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\WINEVT\\Channels\\* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\ChannelAccess AND winlog.event_data.Details:(*\(A;;0x1;;;SY\)* OR *\(A;;0x5;;;BA\)* OR *\(A;;0x1;;;LA\)*)) AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:"C\:\\Windows\\servicing\\TrustedInstaller.exe") OR (process.executable.text:*\\TiWorker.exe))))
author: frack113
